resources.string: Error connecting to the server. Please try again
Log in to Twitch to see your followed channels
Time From must be less than To
Time To must be greater than From
To can\'t be greater than video length
Are you sure you want to delete this video?
Your session has expired. Please log in again
Your followed channels will be shown here
Your downloaded videos will be shown here
Storage permission is required to download videos.
Long videos can be up to 10GB in size. Do you want to download over Wi-Fi?
If you enjoy using Xtra, please take a moment to rate it. It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
No available storage detected (most likely the phone is connected to a computer).
This video is only available to subscribers and cannot be viewed in the app due to Twitch\'s restrictions
Player error. Retrying. Disable Adblock if streams are not loading
Continue playback outside of the app
Google Play Services are not available. Some functions may not work correctly
How much would you like to donate?

August 29th, 1.6.0 
- Added TTV.LOL adblock. Can be disabled in the settings 
- Fixed clips not working 
- Made the refresh stream button smaller and moved it to the bottom left 
- All credits go to /u/Leaguehax for this contribution 

January 24th, 1.5.6.8 
- Fixed stream errors (for now), but you may see more commercials 

January 23rd, 1.5.6.7 
- Just trying to keep the app alive 

January 14th, 1.5.6.6 
- Updated API for streams and videos 
- Fixed chat sometimes not loading 

November 21st, 1.5.6.5 
- Updated adblock 

November 17th, 1.5.6.4 
- Fixed BTTV/FFZ emotes not working 
- Updated adblock 

November 5th, 1.5.6.2 
- Updated adblock 

October 28th, 1.5.6.1 
- Updated adblock 

October 11th, 1.5.6 
- Animated emotes no longer cause overheating and high battery drain, so you can safely enable them in the settings 
- Some changes to logging in to Twitch. If you couldn't login before, try again now 
- Fixed streams sometimes not loading, e.g. when returning to app after a while 
- Improved readability of text on thumbnails 
- Bug fixes and other improvements 

September 30th, 1.5.5 
- Added a setting to enable/disable displaying video beyond the camera notch/hole-punch (Android 9+). Enabled by default 
- Recent emotes now show only those BTTV/FFZ emotes which are enabled on the current channel 

September 27th, 1.5.4 
- Improved adblock, removed "Commercial break in progress" screen 
- Improved GIF emotes performance 
- Camera notch no longer blocks video 

August 31st, 1.5.3 
- Fixed wrong video player and thumbnails size which caused them to be stretched. You can still adjust the aspect ratio for landscape mode in the top right corner of video player's controls 
- Fixed clips not playing without changing quality 
- Adjusted video player's dragging area to avoid accidental drags when trying to swipe down status bar 
- More improvements behind the scenes 

May 31st, 1.5.2 
- Fixed login not working 
- Fixed chat sometimes freezing 
- Bug fixes and improvements 

May 10th, 1.5.1 
- Fixed an error when trying to follow a channel 
- Bug fixes and improvements 

April 26th, 1.5.0 
- Fixed the problem with logging in on some newer devices. For older ones added a new workaround, click the "Having trouble logging in" button 
- Added ability to see the channels that you follow. Click the dropdown menu and select "Channels" 
- Added double tap to show/hide chat 
- Added viewer count to the stream 
- Added compact layout for followed streams which doesn't show previews. Can be enabled in the settings 
- Removed outdated global BTTV and FFZ emotes, now they will be updating automatically 
- Fixed sleep timer not working correctly in audio only mode 
- Other bug fixes and stability improvements 

January 16th, 1.4.5 
- Fixed login error "Error loading web browser" 
- Fixed when emotes sometimes were cutting text or not showing at all 
- Improved rendering of some emotes 
- Increased player height in portrait for tablets 
- More improvements and bug fixes 

January 10th, 1.4.4 
- Added support for low-latency streams (significantly reduced stream delay) 
- Fixed clips not working 
- Fixed audio only setting using too much data 
- Stability improvements for picture-in-picture and more

You can log in using an external browser. After you press \"Authorize\", a page with an error should appear. Copy the url, return here and click the \"Enter url\" button. Paste the url and click \"Log in\"
Your system browser is no longer supported. Please click the button below for a workaround
Disable if streams are not loading
